asprushya - kirthi namaya , petant balapathraya saha kathru bhaga ] pudgala wyapara saha naithika eekaka thani pudgala, hawul wyapa sansthapitha eekaka, labha nolabana sanwidhana , oonama deshiya ho wyawasthanukula samagam namamathra ginum awasanayedi sama ginum warshayak awasanayedima thawakalika aadayam saha wiyadam ginum haduna ganima wikunum, miladi ganum, widuliya udaharanaya: bhanda ho sewa wikunum wartha kirima sadaha wikunum ginumak wiwrutha karana ladi.

kurunagala welagedara kridanganayedi pereda (04 da) pawathi shri lanka nidahas pakshaye hatapas wani sammelanayata sahabhagiwimen anathuruwa aapasu lanka gamanagamana mandalayata ayath bas rathayakin galnawa pradeshayata gaman karamin siti ema pakshaye mahalekam, krushikarma amathya duminda disanayakage aadharakaruwan pirisakata kisiyam pirisak wisin thambauththegama nirawiya palama asaladi gal praharayak ella kota atha.praharayen lanka gamanagamana mandalaye anuradhapura dipowata ayath bas rathaye kondostharawaraya thuwala laba athi athara ohu thambauththegama rohalata athulathwa prathikara laba pitawa gos atha.pereda rathri 8.15 ta pamana mema gal praharaya ella kota athi athara in bas rathaye idiripasa widuruwatada alabhahani siduwi athi bawa thambauththegama polisiya pawasayi.bas rathayata mema gal praharaya ella kala pudgalayan methek athadanguwata gena nomathi athara palagiya sakakaruwan athadanguwata ganimata thambauththegama polisiya wadidura parikshana pawathwayi.
redi awwata danawa.

e”thuma kiyana aakarayata koti thrasthawadiyawa samarimata ida labadenawa nam, koti thrasthawadin tharan minimarapu koti thrasthawadin tharan horakam karapu koti thrasthawadin tharan rajya saha paudgalika depala winasha karapu sanwidhanayak me shri lankadwipaya thula methek bihiwi naha”.

kalin "jems banda","opareshan thoppigala" wage pariganaka krida nipadawapu kattiyagema wadak thama meka.chithrapatayata padanam wela thibuneth pandukabhaya kumarayage kathawa nisa pariganaka kridaweth pradhana charithaya nathnam kridakaya wenneth eyama thamayi.namuth kalin idiripath wuna ewata wada meke thiyena wisheshathwaya wanne mehidi shri lankawe prathama warata thrimana diwi chlana rupa prakshepana thakshanaya upayogi karagena thibimayi.
